Author: harishkanyal
Title: ADO widgets for developers
EnhancedContent:
Hello team,

My team is looking for out-of-the-box or marketplace widgets to track these developer metrics: Code check-ins, lines of code, code reviews, code rejections, and build success/failure. Please let me know if you have you used any of these before?

Thanks

Harish
